Text: First of all, why did you do that? Anyway, for me this seems to be a great sample to test performance of block indexes on multidimensional tables, nothing else.

If I had to guess, I'd say someone's gonna use it to generate on-the-fly pages in some format or another, to spam Google's search results, as many people already do. Other theories: Send "personalized" spam, with adverts relevant to their profession (or whatever other info is included with their email), or use it to phish for their passwords. I know there are other uses for it, but these are the most likely. The existence of this database will probably do more harm than good.
